anime_style.description: 日式动漫风格，适合大多数场景
anime_style.positive_prompt: anime style, vibrant colors, detailed shading, dynamic lighting, key visual, high contrast, sharp focus, professional animation, clean lines, manga influence, expressive characters

oil_painting.positive_prompt: oil painting, impressionist style, brush strokes, vibrant colors, artistic, textured, painterly, museum quality, masterpiece, rich tones, dynamic lighting

cyberpunk.description: 赛博朋克风格，未来科技感
cyberpunk.positive_prompt: cyberpunk, neon lights, futuristic city, dystopian, high tech, low life, rain, holograms, neon colors, cybernetic enhancements, futuristic fashion, blade runner inspired

pixel_art.description: 像素艺术风格，复古游戏感
pixel_art.positive_prompt: pixel art, retro game style, 8-bit, 16-bit, vibrant colors, pixel perfect, clean edges, nostalgic, sprite art, detailed pixels, game asset

realistic.description: 超写实风格，接近照片质量
realistic.positive_prompt: hyperrealistic, photorealistic, ultra detailed, 8k resolution, sharp focus, realistic lighting, natural colors, professional photography, intricate details, lifelike textures

cartoon.description: 卡通风格，类似迪士尼动画
cartoon.positive_prompt: cartoon style, disney animation, vibrant colors, soft edges, playful, exaggerated features, expressive, clean lines, animated, cheerful, whimsical
